editor.title: Editor
editor.clearAllDesc: This will clear the editor content and reset it to an empty GeoJSON.
editor.dataLargeDesc: The content is {{length}} characters ({{size}} MB). Previewing it may freeze the browser.

errors.requiresPointAndPolygon: Requires both Point and Polygon features.
errors.gridTooDense: Grid too dense (> {{countVal}} cells). Max allowed is {{maxVal}}. Please increase cell size or reduce area.

success.replaced: Replaced editor content with analysis result.
success.added: Added analysis result to editor content.

center.name: Center
center.desc: Takes a Feature or FeatureCollection and returns the absolute center point of all features.

bbox.name: BBox
bbox.desc: Calculates the bounding box for any GeoJSON object.

polygonSmooth.name: Polygon Smooth
polygonSmooth.desc: Smooths polygon boundaries with configurable iterations.

buffer.name: Buffer
buffer.desc: Calculates a buffer for input features for a given radius.

voronoi.name: Voronoi
voronoi.desc: Creates Voronoi polygons from input points.

simplify.name: Simplify
simplify.desc: Simplifies geometry by removing vertices using Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm.

concave.name: Concave
concave.desc: Takes a set of points and returns a concave hull Polygon or MultiPolygon.

union.name: Union
union.desc: Combines two or more polygons into a single polygon.

intersect.name: Intersect
intersect.desc: Takes a set of polygons and returns their common intersection area.

difference.name: Difference
difference.desc: Finds the difference by clipping subsequent polygons from the first.

midpoint.name: Midpoint
midpoint.desc: Takes two points and returns a point midway between them.

measurement.name: Measurement
measurement.desc: Adds Area (sqm/sqkm) and Length (m/km) properties to features.

pointsWithin.name: Points Within
pointsWithin.desc: Finds points that fall within the supplied polygons.

hexGrid.name: Hex Grid
hexGrid.desc: Generates a hexagonal grid within the bounding box.

pointGrid.name: Point Grid
pointGrid.desc: Generates a point grid within the bounding box.

squareGrid.name: Square Grid
squareGrid.desc: Generates a square grid within the bounding box.

convex.name: Convex Hull
convex.desc: Calculates the convex hull of the input features.

labels.largeDataset: Large dataset detected. Browser may freeze temporarily while updating.

drawing.modeActive: Drawing mode active. Press Esc to exit.

map.searchHint: Press Enter after typing a location name to jump to the target location on the map.

properties.title: Properties
properties.selected: Selected. Double-click or right-click to edit properties. Esc to deselect.

export.title: Export
export.description: Export your GeoJSON data in various formats

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Upload GeoJSON, Shapefile, or WKT files
import.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here

error.unsupported: Unsupported file format. Please upload a GeoJSON, Shapefile (ZIP), or WKT (TXT) file.
